abstract: The business-oriented networking service has its partisans, but its interface leaves something to be desired. Could it borrow a page from Facebook?
snippet: The business-oriented networking service has its partisans, but its interface leaves something to be desired. Could it borrow a page from Facebook?
lead_paragraph: Our savvy friends over at DealBook take stock of the reports, including one by VentureBeat, that LinkedIn, the professionals’ social networking site, is about to go public.

headline.main: DealBook: Is LinkedIn Getting Ready for an I.P.O.?
